extends java.lang.Object

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  FieldWrapper.DateFieldWrapper
      DateFieldWrapper is used to represent a field on a resource representing a date and/or time.

    • Constructor Detail

      • FieldWrapper

        public FieldWrapper​(java.lang.String fieldPath)
        Create a FieldWrapper for the field defined by the given path.
        Parameters:
        fieldPath - Path to FHIR field (not FHIRPath). Should be of the form: Resource.field.nestedField.nested2...

      • FieldWrapper

        public FieldWrapper​(java.lang.Class<? extends org.hl7.fhir.r4.model.Resource> clazz,
                    java.lang.String fieldName)
        Create a FieldWrapper for the field on the given resource type defined by the given path.
        Parameters:
        fieldName - Path to FHIR field (not FHIRPath). Should not include resourceType and should be of the form: field.nestedField.nested2...

    • Method Detail

      • getSingle

        public org.hl7.fhir.instance.model.api.IBase getSingle​(org.hl7.fhir.r4.model.Resource resource)
        Get a single value from the field this FieldWrapper represents from the given resource. For fields that may have more than a single value, use getAll(Resource) instead. Calling this on a field that has more than one value will return only the first value.
        Parameters:
        resource - Resource to get value from
        Returns:
        the value from the field

      • getAll

        public java.util.List<org.hl7.fhir.instance.model.api.IBase> getAll​(org.hl7.fhir.r4.model.Resource resource)
        Get the values from the field this FieldWrapper represents from the given resource.
        Parameters:
        resource - Resource to get value from
        Returns:
        the list of values from the field

      • set

        public void set​(org.hl7.fhir.r4.model.Resource resource,
                org.hl7.fhir.instance.model.api.IBase value)
        Set the given value for the field this FieldWrapper represents on the given resource.
        Parameters:
        resource - The resource to set a value on
        value - The value to set
